response.original_title: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
response.overview: A small town band makes it big, but loses track of their roots, as they get caught up into the big-time machinations of the music biz. Now, they must thwart a plot to destroy their home town. Built around the music of The Beatles, this musical uses some big name groups like Peter Frampton and Aerosmith.
response.tagline: A splendid time is guaranteed for all!
response.title: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band

titles.title: Orkiestra klubu samotnych serc sierzanta Peppera
